Dear Patrick,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

We can initiate insurance coverage for the building as soon as it is handed over by the contractors. To add the new location, we will need the following details:

*	The estimated construction cost of the building. (Build-up cost; not including the land value)
*	The estimated cost of internal fixtures and built-in decor (fixed decoration).
*	The approximate value of furniture, decoration and equipment that will eventually be brought in.
*	Details of any personal effects or jewelry you wish to insure.

Additionally, for high-value paintings or artwork, a specialized arts cover policy will be necessary for adequate protection.

We can initiate insurance coverage for the building as soon as it is handed over by the contractors. To add the new location, we will need the following details:

*	The estimated construction cost of the building. (Build-up cost; not including the land value)
*	The estimated cost of internal fixtures and built-in decor (fixed decoration).
*	The approximate value of furniture, decoration and equipment that will eventually be brought in.
*	Details of any personal effects or jewelry you wish to insure.

Additionally, for high-value paintings or artwork, a specialized arts cover policy will be necessary for adequate protection.
